verbs.description: red sox celebrate after [ARG0: team] [V: clinches] [ARG1: world series advancement] the boston red sox beat the houston astros 4 - 1 in game 5 of the alcs and with that advanced their way into the world series with a triumphant night the team celebrated on the field and popped champagne in the new england world series
